CroPlotR 1.0.0

Specific functions to generate dynamic plots

Source: R/specific_plotting_dynamic.R
specific_dynamic_plots.Rd

Generate dynamic plots for the different cases handled in CroPlotR (plant mixture, plot several simulation results on same graph, ...) as specified by the different arguments.

plot_dynamic(df_data, sit, successive, title = NULL)

Arguments

df_data

A named list of data frame including the data to plot (one df per situation)

sit

The name of the situation to plot

successive

A list of lists containing the situations to be represented as a contiguous sequence

title

The plot title (optional, NULL by default)

Value

A ggplot object

A list of ggplot objects

Details

List of the different specific functions:

  • plot_dynamic_mixture: Generate a dynamic plot for the case of mixture of crops, single simulation version and each variable in different plot

  • plot_dynamic_mixture_overlap: Generate a dynamic plot for the case of mixture of crops, single simulation version and several variables in same plot (overlap)

  • plot_dynamic_versions: Generate a dynamic plot for the case of sole crops, all simulation versions in same plot and each variable in a plot

  • plot_dynamic_overlap: Generate a dynamic plot for the case of sole crops, single simulation version and several variables in same plot (overlap)

  • plot_dynamic_mixture_versions_overlap: not implemented (seems not useful because too complex to analyze)

  • plot_dynamic_versions_overlap: Generate a dynamic plot for the case of sole crops, all simulation versions and several variables in same plot (overlap)

  • plot_dynamic_mixture_versions: Generate a dynamic plot for the case of mixture of crops, all simulation versions in same plot and each variable in a plot

Contents
